module.name: User Management
module.description: This Module manages all PBX users. It allows an Administrator to create a User Account that can be used by other applications for login or API purposes.
module.changelog: *15.0.69.8* Packaging of ver 15.0.69.8 *15.0.69.7* Packaging of ver 15.0.69.7 *15.0.69.6* FREEPBX-23601 *15.0.69.5* Packaging of ver 15.0.69.5 *15.0.69.4* bump *15.0.69.3* Packaging of ver 15.0.69.3 *15.0.69.2* FREEI-4777 *15.0.69.1* FREEI-4663 and FREEI-4602 *15.0.69* FREEI-4540 *15.0.68* Packaging of ver 15.0.68 *15.0.67* Packaging of ver 15.0.67 *15.0.66* FREEPBX-23162 *15.0.65* FREEI-4041 added new parameter 'emptyExistingCache' for setModuleSettingByID functions which helps to reset moduleUserSettingsCache when required *15.0.64* FREEI-1194 Possible for job cron task to become locked indefinitely *15.0.63* FREEI-4229 Added frontend validation for users password field *15.0.62* FREEI-4107 Fixed warning messages misaligned inside the pop-up window *15.0.61* FREEI-4063 Added condition to display note only when there are error messages *15.0.60* FREEI-4063 Added note about settings to password strength description *15.0.59* FREEI-4062 Password complexity rules are enabled by default on upgrade *15.0.58* Packaging of ver 15.0.58 *15.0.57* FREEI-4064 userman auth settings - adjust the help text for a some policies *15.0.56* FREEI-3161 Fixe conflicts for password policies, and tab button issues *15.0.55* FREEI-3979 FREEPBX-22855 Fixe mutiple issues with button and whoups errors *15.0.54* FREEPBX-22812 and FREEPBX-22828 *15.0.53* FREEPBX-22828 Don't auto-create extension and user UCP template features *15.0.52* FREEPBX-22634 FREEPBX-22812 Unable to delete user from user manager without selecting a directory, Add button in Groups Tab allows to add a group if this one is disabled *15.0.51* SCD-15 modified the checkCredentials method to include default_extension/password validation besides username/password validation *15.0.50* Fixing FREEPBX-22635 *15.0.49* FREEPBX-22792 FreePBX 15 Updates and Contact Manager *15.0.48* FREEI-3765 Add a proper email for template creator *15.0.47* FREEPBX-22602: Don't transform search query to lowercase *15.0.46* FREEPBX-22700 FREEPBX-22702 UCP template install and Ldap directory issue *15.0.45* FREEI-3688 added condition to restore new ucp tables data ('userman_template_settings' and 'userman_ucp_templates') *15.0.44* Packaging of ver 15.0.44 *15.0.43* SMOBILE-294 select by module from userman-settings *15.0.42* FREEI-3369 Adding UCP template feature *15.0.41* FREEI-3556: stop using accountcode for sangomrartapi conference app *15.0.40* Packaging of ver 15.0.40 *15.0.39* FREEI-3547: don't add AMPUSER/none/accountcode to asterisk database *15.0.38* FREEI-3528: remove restapps_rtapi_conferences rows for deleted user *15.0.37* FREEI-2691 Added condition to use password given in GQL query (addExtension/UpdateExtension) to access user control panel or else to generate a new random password *15.0.36* FREEI-3350: set /AMPUSER/ext/accountcode to each extension's userId *15.0.35* Add previous user e-mail address to extraData *15.0.34* FREEPBX-21901: fixed data recovery *15.0.33* FREEPBX-21902- Remove directory in table kvstore - v13 *15.0.32* FREEPBX-21782: Backup and restore all data modulo *15.0.31* Packaging of ver 15.0.31 *15.0.30* Packaging of ver 15.0.30 *15.0.29* FREEPBX-20823: LDAP users, contact data is deleted *15.0.28* FREEI-1623 Userman Delete button GUI improvement *15.0.27* FREEI-1458 user manager: add instructions to select a directory to add users *15.0.26* Fixed typo when calling delete group hook *15.0.25* FREEPBX-21400 User Manager missing functionality after restore of legacy backup *15.0.24* FREEPBX-21400 User Manager missing functionality after restore of legacy backup *15.0.23* FREEI-1201 Ordering userman groups generates PHP error *15.0.22* FREEI-932 some displayed info needs to be sanitized to prevent injected scripts from running *15.0.22* Fixing comments from FREEI-845 *15.0.21* Resolving a few XSS vulnerabilities *15.0.19* FREEPBX-20579 Restoring legacy(FreePBX 12) Backup into FreePBX 15 system is giving sql error. *15.0.18* FREEPBX-20579 Restoring legacy(FreePBX 12) Backup into FreePBX 15 system is giving sql error "SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1 no such table: userman_directories on line 3204 of file *15.0.17* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.16* Fixes FREEPBX-20337: added CSS class "confidential" to password input (FreePBX 14 backport) *15.0.15* Fixes FREEPBX-20509: Disable Password field, if a user is currently linked *15.0.14* Fixes FREEPBX-20337: added CSS class "confidential" to password input *15.0.13* FREEPBX-20452 User groups under Usermanagement Users is not selected *15.0.12* FREEI-680 FREEI-679 Userman Backup Restore 15 and Legacy *15.0.11* Fixing FREEPBX-20390 *15.0.10* Adding Job class *15.0.9* Use lazy loading console commands *15.0.8.2* FREEPBX-19572 *15.0.8.1* Fix backup *15.0.8* fixing legacy restore *15.0.7* Fix issues in backup *15.0.6.2* FREEPBX-18752 - improving help text *15.0.6.1* Display user locks *15.0.6* Bugfix/FREEPBX-17069 dashboard ucp accessible *15.0.5* Added optional parameter forceType to sendEmail function *15.0.4* Rest Api *15.0.3* Packaging of ver 15.0.3 *15.0.2* Fixing FREEPBX-17563 Importing userman groups issue *15.0.1* FreePBX 15 backup
